name: Lugia ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Silver Sparkle
poke_body.effect: If Lugia ex is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if Lugia ex is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, choose an Energy card attached to the Attacking Pokémon and return it to your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Elemental Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy, {W} Energy, and {L} Energy attached to Lugia ex.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
